meanings.definition: A person who has had a limb removed by surgery or trauma.
meanings.sent1: The brave amputee learned to walk again with a prosthetic leg.
meanings.sent2: The hospital provided support groups for new amputees to adjust to their new reality.
meanings.sent3: The amputee joked that he was now 'half the man he used to be'.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an amputee without her phone, missing a vital part of herself.
meanings.sent5: The image of the smiling amputee running a marathon inspired many.
